options.name: Well-Read
options.description: You have extensive knowledge of history, culture, and lore. Gain +1 skill with academics and learn one additional language of your choice.

options.name: Action : Tactical Analysis
options.description: Study a visible enemy. Make a logic check (DC 8). On success, learn their highest skill, lowest defense, and one damage type they have mitigation against. Share this knowledge with allies.

options.name: Reaction : Recall Knowledge
options.description: When an ally within earshot attempts a skill check, you may share relevant knowledge. If you succeed on an academics check (DC 8), they gain +1 die on their check.

options.name: Mental Discipline
options.description: Your trained mind resists distraction. Gain +1 skill with concentration. You are immune to the dazed condition and gain +1 die on checks to resist mental conditions.

options.name: Linguistic Mastery
options.description: You are a master of communication. Gain +1 skill with expression and learn two additional languages. You can attempt to communicate basic concepts with creatures whose language you don't know using logic checks.

options.name: Analytical Mind
options.description: Your deductive abilities are supernatural. Gain +2 skill with logic. You can use logic in place of senses to detect illusions, hidden doors, or traps.

options.name: Action : Exploit Weakness
options.description: After successfully analyzing an enemy, share their weakness with all allies. For the next minute, all allies gain +1 die on attacks against that enemy and +1 damage if targeting their lowest mitigation type.

options.name: Arcane Scholar
options.description: Your study of magical theory grants practical benefits. Gain +1 skill with magic. You can identify spells being cast with an academics check and gain +1 die on saves against spells you've identified.

options.name: Master Teacher
options.description: You excel at passing on knowledge. Gain +1 skill with persuasion. During downtime, allies who spend a day training with you gain +1 die on their next check using a skill you have at 4 or higher.

options.name: Omniscient
options.description: Your knowledge approaches the supernatural. Gain +1 skill with academics and +1 skill with logic. Once per day, declare you've studied this exact situation before. Ask the GM three questions about the current scenario - they must answer truthfully. You and your allies gain +1 die on all related checks for the next hour.
